abstract: General Mills' Wheaties is joining with Fulton Brewery to create limited-edition beer called HefeWheaties.
lead_paragraph: Wheaties says it is teaming with a craft brewery to create a limited-edition beer, to be called HefeWheaties.

headline.main: General Mills Plans the Beer of Champions
headline.print_headline: General Mills Plans the Beer of Champions

snippet: Wheaties says it is teaming with a craft brewery to create a limited-edition beer, to be called HefeWheaties.
